name: 張合
objective: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
schedule:
1.Course description
2.Virtual Manufacturing Applications in Ford Powertrain Operations
3.On-Line Detection of Corrosion Degradation of Pressure Vessels – Applications of Key Technologies of Industry 4.0 
4.Advanced Analytical Techniques by AFM/SPM
5.Adaptive-Enhanced Control for Piezo-Actuated Stage
6.Motion control of an underwater autonomous vehicle
7.Real Time Assessment of Ball Bearing Conditions to Achieve Intelligent Machines – Applications of Key Technologies of Industry 4.0
8.Design Novel Ultrasonic Nebulizer and Simulate the Minimum Amplitude of Vibration for Atomization
9.Development and Testing of the PEMFCs for Stationary Fuel Cell Power Systems
10.High Entropy Alloys: Applications & Theory
11.Using magnetic structures for gas sensing
12.Development of Guanyin Road Tunnel Ventilation Solver
13.Solar Energy Harvesting Scheme Utilizing Low Dimensional Micro- and Nano-structures
